name: Bailu

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

story: The High Elder of the Vidyadhara, who is also known as the "Healer Lady" on the Luofu.She uses her unique medical science and the medical treatment that can only be provided by the Vidyadhara dragon race to save lives.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Diagnostic Kick
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Singing Among Clouds
skills.description: Restores HP for a single ally, then heals random allies.

skills.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
skills.description: Restores HP for all allies, and grants them Invigoration, or prolongs the duration of their Invigoration.

skills.name: Gourdful of Elixir
skills.description: When an ally with Invigoration is attacked, restores HP for the ally.When an ally suffers a killing blow, Bailu immediately restores their HP. This effect can only trigger 1 time per battle.

skills.name: Saunter in the Rain
skills.description: After this character uses Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration.

eidolons.name: Ambrosial Aqua
eidolons.description: If the target ally's current HP is equal to their Max HP when Invigoration ends, regenerates 8 extra Energy for this target.

eidolons.name: Sylphic Slumber
eidolons.description: After using her Ultimate, Bailu's Outgoing Healing increases by an additional 15% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Omniscient Opulence
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Evil Excision
eidolons.description: Every healing provided by the Skill makes the recipient deal 10% more DMG for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

eidolons.name: Waning Worries
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Drooling Drop of Draconic Divinity
eidolons.description: Bailu can heal allies who received a killing blow 1 more time(s) in a single battle.
